{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.07639v1", "title": "Intégrale orbitale pondérée via l'induite de Lusztig-Spaltenstein
  généralisée", "summary": "In this article, we present two novel approaches to constructing weighted
orbital integrals of an inner form of a general linear group. Our method
utilizes generalized Lustig-Spaltenstein induction. Furthermore, we will prove
that a weighted orbital integral on the Lie algebra constitutes a tempered
distribution. We also demonstrate that our new definitions and Arthur's
original definition are consistent.", "main_category": "math.RT", "categories": "math.RT", "published": "2025-04-10T10:38:30Z"}
